verses.text: \w Give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* thy \w judgments|strong="H4941"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and thy \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* unto the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.\f + \fr 72.1 \ft for: or, of\f*
He shall \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* with \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and thy \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* with \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

The \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and the little \w hills|strong="H1389"\w*, by \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

He shall \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, he shall \w save|strong="H3467"\w* the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, and shall break in \w pieces|strong="H1792"\w* the \w oppressor|strong="H6231"\w*.

They shall \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee as long \w as|strong="H5973"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w* and \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* \w endure|strong="H6440"\w*, throughout \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.

He shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* like \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* upon the \w mown|strong="H1488"\w* grass: as \w showers|strong="H7241"\w* \add that\add* \w water|strong="H2222"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

In his \w days|strong="H3117"\w* shall the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w flourish|strong="H6524"\w*; and \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* so long as the \w moon|strong="H3394"\w* endureth.\f + \fr 72.7 \ft so long…: Heb. till there be no moon\f*

He shall have \w dominion|strong="H7287"\w* also from \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* to \w sea|strong="H3220"\w*, and from the \w river|strong="H5104"\w* unto the \w ends|strong="H0657"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

They that dwell in the \w wilderness|strong="H6728"\w* shall \w bow|strong="H3766"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* him; and his \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* shall \w lick|strong="H3897"\w* the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.

The \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Tarshish|strong="H8659"\w* and of the \w isles|strong="H0339"\w* shall \w bring|strong="H7725"\w* \w presents|strong="H4503"\w*: the \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w* and \w Seba|strong="H5434"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w gifts|strong="H0814"\w*.
Yea, all \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* shall fall \w down|strong="H7812"\w* before him: all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* him.

For he shall \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* when he \w crieth|strong="H7768"\w*; the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* also, and \add him\add* that hath no \w helper|strong="H5826"\w*.
He shall \w spare|strong="H2347"\w* the \w poor|strong="H1800"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*, and shall \w save|strong="H3467"\w* the \w souls|strong="H5315"\w* of the \w needy|strong="H0034"\w*.

He shall \w redeem|strong="H1350"\w* their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* from \w deceit|strong="H8496"\w* and \w violence|strong="H2555"\w*: and \w precious|strong="H3365"\w* shall their \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* be in his \w sight|strong="H5869"\w*.

And he shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and to him shall be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* of the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w* of \w Sheba|strong="H7614"\w*: prayer also shall be \w made|strong="H6419"\w* for him \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*; \add and\add* \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* shall he be \w praised|strong="H1288"\w*.\f + \fr 72.15 \ft shall be given: Heb. one shall give\f*

There shall be an \w handful|strong="H6451"\w* of \w corn|strong="H1250"\w* in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* upon the \w top|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w*; the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* thereof shall \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* like \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*: and \add they\add* of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w flourish|strong="H6692"\w* like \w grass|strong="H6212"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

His \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall endure for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: his \w name|strong="H8034"\w* shall be \w continued|strong="H5125"\w* as long \w as|strong="H6440"\w* the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*: and \add men\add* shall be \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* in him: all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shall call him \w blessed|strong="H0833"\w*.\f + \fr 72.17 \ft endure: Heb. be\f*\f + \fr 72.17 \ft his name shall be…: Heb. shall be as a son to continue his father’s name for ever\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, the \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who only \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* wondrous \w things|strong="H6381"\w*.

And \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* his \w glorious|strong="H3519"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: and let the whole \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* be \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \add with\add* his \w glory|strong="H3519"\w*; \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*, and \w Amen|strong="H0543"\w*.
The \w prayers|strong="H8605"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jesse|strong="H3448"\w* are \w ended|strong="H3615"\w*.
